name: Lab Escape (ItaiUukl)
description:
The lead scientist has been working extra hours tonight and out of exhaustion forgot to lock your cage. Now you, the cunning lab monkey, have to cooperate with your rat lab-mate in order to achieve freedom.

Crack your heads, and a bunch of lab equipment on the way, in the clever Point & Click Adventure game: "Lab Escape".

An exercise in game design created as part of a university course.

Created by: Keren & Itai
